name: Peshawari Naan
history: Peshawari Naan is a sweet, stuffed naan originating from the Peshawar region of Pakistan. It's a popular variation of naan bread in Indian and Pakistani cuisines, known for its rich filling of dried fruits and nuts.
description: Peshawari Naan is a delicately sweet and nutty bread, stuffed with a mixture of dried fruits and nuts. It's typically baked in a tandoor or oven, resulting in a soft, fluffy bread with a crispy exterior and a rich, flavorful filling.

ingredients.item: filling: mixed dried fruits (raisins, apricots, etc.)

instructions.title: Prepare the Dough
instructions.description: In a mixing bowl, combine all-purpose flour, baking powder, baking soda, sugar, and salt. Add milk, yogurt, and melted ghee or butter. Knead into a soft dough. Cover and let it rest for 30 minutes.

instructions.title: Prepare Filling
instructions.description: Mix the chopped dried fruits and nuts to create the filling.

instructions.title: Stuff and Roll Naans
instructions.description: Divide the dough into equal portions. Roll out each portion, place a spoonful of filling in the center, seal, and roll out into a flat circular shape.

instructions.title: Bake the Naans
instructions.description: Preheat the oven. Place the rolled-out naans on a baking tray. Brush with oil and bake until golden brown.

instructions.title: Serve
instructions.description: Serve the Peshawari Naans hot, preferably with a side of curry or chutney.

tips: Ensure the dough is soft and pliable for best results.
Adjust the amount of filling to your preference.
variations: Experiment with different combinations of dried fruits and nuts.
Add a sprinkle of cardamom powder to the filling for an extra flavor.

storage.shelfLife: Best consumed fresh. Can be stored for up to 1 day.
storage.instructions: Store in an airtight container and reheat before serving.

reheatingInstructions.instruction: Reheat in an oven or on a tawa until warm.

presentationTips: Serve on a platter with a side of mint chutney.
Garnish with a sprinkle of chopped nuts on top.
